reviews.review_msg: Super nice and helpful teacher! The amount of work is fair and she is a very fair marker, not easy but you get what you deserve. Gives a lot of feed back! and lets you re-write certain assignments. Class is very interesting! also no textbook so you save money that way

Great teacher! makes the material exciting. She's very helpful and knowledgeable. It's a highly theoretical course. Be wary though, her marking is tough, but also fair. I hope SFU recruits more teachers like her.

Helen, is a very hard marker, her class is very writing intensive, however,you do not received credit for it, I did more writing in her class than in my W course. She responds quickly to emails if question arise, but is not very personable! Helen picks favourites in her class!

This class was amazing! If you genuinely are interested in power dynamics within society, you'll love this course! Helen is a fantastic prof! She's pretty easy and very open to other ideas. I'll be sure to take other classes with her! Just be sure to participate!
